event-group.description: This is where all the serious work will happen. I wonder if you can have nested groups
event-group.title: General Gameplay

sub-events.comment: IF wherever you are is connected to the place you clicked on
Once we've moved to the end of the route, stops the player and tosses everything back

event-group.title: Making Only The Sprites We Want To Move, Move

sub-events.comment: Mostly startup stuff. Attaches the stick figures destination to the stick figure
Checks that the sprite has the same location tag as the "target"
Stopping the car once it gets back to the centre

action.name: Set text
action.param: "If each person took their own car, they would use " & Move.ReturnValue & " fuel."

sub-events.comment: This is a mess. The first y value (0) sets up what the cell is. Y1 and Y2 are the x and y coords. y3 is the primary connection, y4 is the secondary connection. 100 is N/A

event-group.title: Did We Run Out of Players?

sub-events.comment: If the return value is 0, you delivered everyone.

action.name: Append text
action.param: "If each person took their own car, they would use " & InitialFuelCost & " fuel. "

sub-events.comment: intentionally has no functionality. Add in final version.
